LanguageData.JRWStegosaurus.label: Stegosaurus
LanguageData.JRWStegosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03729-1887 [STEGOSAURUS STENOPS] CODENAME: THYREOS >230
A very famous stegosaurid. They are protective over their young, but are often very forgiving of intruders to their stomping grounds, unless they pose a threat. They wield their tail deftly.
LanguageData.JRWStegosaurus.tools.tail.label: tail
